capabilities.name: Act with Integrity
capabilities.description: The role requires ethical decision-making and adherence to environmental laws and regulations.

capabilities.name: Communicate Effectively
capabilities.description: Must communicate complex environmental planning information clearly to various stakeholders.

capabilities.name: Work Collaboratively
capabilities.description: Requires collaboration with government agencies, developers, and community groups to achieve environmental outcomes.

capabilities.name: Influence and Negotiate
capabilities.description: Needs to negotiate and influence outcomes with various stakeholders for improved environmental and conservation outcomes.

capabilities.name: Deliver Results
capabilities.description: Responsible for leading teams to deliver timely and accurate environmental planning and assessment advice.

capabilities.name: Plan and Prioritise
capabilities.description: Must plan and prioritise complex planning matters and team workloads effectively.

capabilities.name: Think and Solve Problems
capabilities.description: Requires strong analytical skills to identify solutions within legislative frameworks.

capabilities.name: Demonstrate Accountability
capabilities.description: Accountable for the strategic counsel provided to the Minister, Executive, and consent authorities.

capabilities.name: Manage and Develop People
capabilities.description: Involves leading and managing multidisciplinary teams.

capabilities.name: Inspire Direction and Purpose
capabilities.description: Must communicate goals and vision to teams and stakeholders for environmental conservation.

capabilities.name: Manage Reform and Change
capabilities.description: Supports and promotes change towards improved environmental and conservation outcomes.

skills.name: Environmental Legislation Knowledge
skills.description: Understanding of the Biodiversity Conservation Act 2016 and Environmental Planning and Assessment Act 1979.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.description: Ability to lead and manage multidisciplinary teams towards achieving environmental outcomes.

skills.name: Stakeholder Management
skills.description: Proficiency in engaging with and influencing outcomes among government agencies, developers, and community groups.

skills.name: Strategic Planning
skills.description: Capability to provide strategic counsel and plan for sustainable development and conservation.

generalRole.title: Senior Environmental Planning and Conservation Leader
generalRole.description: This role involves leading multidisciplinary teams to deliver improved environmental and conservation outcomes through strategic planning, stakeholder engagement, and application of environmental laws and regulations.
